I like the 50cal popping up. The model of the vulcan is awesome. And the airborne laser is one hell of a debris buster.

But the laser does have one minor flaw. Though it is extremely accurate in any direction, it has great difficulties aiming dead ahead.

Edit: I just noticed a potential lethal flaw. In map mode, with a gun still active, it fires on a left mouse click. With absolutely no idea where you're aiming.

Perhaps a good idea to disable the trigger in map mode.

Lack, I'll make a better guide when I have time, but hopefully this will help a little:

The pitchTransform and yawTransforms' local X axis points toward the front of the gun with Z pointing up. The gun model itself should point towards the global negative Z direction.

Hey BahamutoD, I love the work you are doing on all of your mods! Is there a chance that you would at some point want to make a tutorial on how to make a part for KSP, from start to finish? I've toyed around in Blender and made a model of a cockpit, but I can never get the texturing right, and I'm sure that I'm missing some little tips and tricks when it comes to modeling the part, especially with small details. Plus I haven't touched Unity yet.... You seem like the kind of person who has a lot of experience with all of the programs associated, since you've been pushing out all of these awesome parts within a few days! I know you are busy with the mods at hand, so I wouldn't expect a tutorial soon, but eventually would be great for people like me who would love to get into modding. Thanks for all the great stuff!
